languages.text: "Это — последнее мое воспоминание о матери. И о прежней жизни — до {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g} и послушничества, до испытания, до принятия обетов".
"That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."
languages.original_text: "Это — последнее мое воспоминание о матери. И о прежней жизни — до {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Схола Прогениум{/g} и послушничества, до испытания, до принятия обетов".

traits.locale_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the Schola Progenium and the novitiate, before the test, before the vows."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “关于我的母亲和我从前的生活，那就是最后的记忆。那个时候，我还没有加入{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}，没有成为见习修女，没有通过考验，也没有许下誓言。”
languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

traits.locale_text: “关于我的母亲和我从前的生活，那就是最后的记忆。那个时候，我还没有加入{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}忠嗣学院{/g}，没有成为见习修女，没有通过考验，也没有许下誓言。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the Schola Progenium and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

languages.text: «Ese fue el último recuerdo de mi madre. Y de mi antigua vida, antes de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}, del noviciado, de mis pruebas y de los juramentos».
languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

traits.locale_text: «Ese fue el último recuerdo de mi madre. Y de mi antigua vida, antes de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}, del noviciado, de mis pruebas y de los juramentos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「それが私の母との最後の思い出だ。私が{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}に入り、修練女となる前のこと。試練の、そして誓願の前のこと」
languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

traits.locale_text: 「それが私の母との最後の思い出だ。私が{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}帝国教導院{/g}に入り、修練女となる前のこと。試練の、そして誓願の前のこと」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das war meine letzte Erinnerung an meine Mutter. Und an mein früheres Leben — vor der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} und dem Noviziat, vor meinem Eid."
languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

traits.locale_text: "Das war meine letzte Erinnerung an meine Mutter. Und an mein früheres Leben — vor der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} und dem Noviziat, vor meinem Eid."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est le dernier souvenir que je possède de ma mère. Et de ma vie passée, avant la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} et mon noviciat, avant mes épreuves, avant mes vœux. »
languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le dernier souvenir que je possède de ma mère. Et de ma vie passée, avant la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} et mon noviciat, avant mes épreuves, avant mes vœux. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Anneme, {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium'dan{/g} ve acemiliğimden önceki hayatıma, imtihanlarımdan ve yeminlerimden öncesine dair son hatıram buydu."
languages.original_text: "That was my last memory of my mother. And of my former life — before the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g} and the novitiate, before my trials, before the vows."

traits.locale_text: "Anneme, {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgenium}Schola Progenium{/g}'dan ve talebeliğimden önceki hayatıma, imtihanlarımdan ve yeminlerimden öncesine dair son hatıram buydu."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
